name: openai-calling-sample
description: --- page_type: sample languages: - javascript - nodejs - products: - azure - azure-communication-services ---

scripts.setup: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.start: cd client && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.start:dev: cd client && npm run start:dev && cd ..
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.package: cd client && npm run package && cd ..
